content.text: If applicable and possible, all plastic material should be marked according to ISO 11469 to ease  recycling.
Le cas échéant et si possible, il convient de marquer tous les matériaux en plastique  conformément à l'ISO 11469 pour en faciliter le recyclage.

requirements.text: If applicable and possible, all plastic material should be marked according to ISO 11469 to ease  recycling.
